item.title: http://educationalsoftware.wikispaces.com/Flickr
item.description: Superb wiki page all about the educational uses of Flickr. PDF download, lots of links and Flickr resources
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: ICT Tools images web2.0 wiki

item.title: Imagination Cubed
item.description: Great sketch and drawing tool. Will be superb on a whiteboard. Replays your drawing as flash animation.
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: art tools whiteboard

item.title: Comiqs | Create & Share your Comic Stories
item.description: Brilliant online comic creator. Add photos or pics, add speech bubble, thought bubbles etc and publish. Embed in a blog. Displays page by page as a slideshow presentation,. Really cool.
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: Tools art creativity digitalstorytelling images presentation publishing

item.title: Eurosport Fantasy Tour de France
item.description: Fantasy Tour de France League
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: cycling

item.title: argilla: Tipmage
item.description: Add tooltips (when your mouse hovers over part of an image it displays a small information box) to images. Great to put a big image on a webpage and then allow readers to discover the tooltips.
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: images tools

item.title: Naace Big Book Maker
item.description: Online Big Book Maker from Naace. Only works with .txt files.
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: Tools literacy publishing whiteboard

item.title: Splashr
item.description: Really cool presentation tool using Flickr. Add a tag or a user id and search for a set of photos, then choose one of the standard slideshows to present. So many lesson possibilities.
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: images presentation tools

item.title: http://johnjohnston.name/flickrCC/
item.description: Experimental Creative Commons search that gives you the code to embed in a blog
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: creativecommons images web2.0

item.title: FlickrStorm. Search on Flickr with some Magic
item.description: Creative Commons image search
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: creativecommons images web2.0

item.title: flickrCC
item.description: Creative Commons image search
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: creativecommons images web2.0

item.title: learninginhand.com - Podcasting for Teachers & Students Booklet
item.description: Useful booklet on Podcasting - free download covering all the major pieces of software and techniques.
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: podcasts

item.title: edublogs: Why would you use words on the screen when they do just fine in your mouth?
item.description: Great post to make you think about the next time you get your class to make a PowerPoint.
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: powerpoint presentation

item.title: Spore™
item.description: Creature creator- requires a program to download and install. There's a free edition and a purchase edition with loads more body parts. Mmm, nice...
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: creativity games

item.title: FlipVideo UK
item.description: The death of digi blue? One of this year's must have gadgets.
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: video

item.title: Video: Podcasting in Plain English | Common Craft - Explanations In Plain English
item.description: One of those fab "In Plain English" videos, this one explaining podcasting.
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: education podcasts web2.0

item.title: Buzzword
item.description: Very slick online flashbased wordprocessor. I suspect children will find it more intuitive to use than GoogleApps, but is only a wordprocessor, no spreadsheet, presenter etc. Good first step into online collaboraton? Post your homework here!
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: googleapps school tools web2.0

item.title: Adobe ConnectNow web conferencing from Acrobat.com
item.description: Very slick video meeting tool with VOIP, whiteboard, screenshare, fileshare, chat, remote control and more. Will it get through school's firewall? Major shortcoming is it only supports a max of 3 users in th free version. Pro version is v expensive.
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: conferencing tools video

item.title: Mathtrain.TV
item.description: A site consisting solely of maths videos, some student made, some teacher made. Youtube for maths teachers.
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: Maths video

item.title: ITASS ICT Scheme Of Work
item.description: London Borough of Newham are developing a scheme of work for ICT as an up-to-date alternative to the QCA
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: ICT resources

item.title: Wordle - ict
item.description: Add text, play with fonts, colours and layout - true wordart.
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: art images literacy

item.title: MyStudiyo Quizzes - Create a quiz and embed it on your website or blog in just minutes!
item.description: This is a really cool tool to create quizzes from embedding in your blog
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: blogging tools web2.0

item.title: Shine - the Nationals Schools Festival celebrating the talent in everyone
item.description: Website showcasing creative talent - you get a free webpage to upload examples of your school's creativity
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: creativity education ict school

item.title: Issuu - You Publish
item.description: Make your own e-books. Very slick online embedable e-book creator. Only shortcoming is that it only imports pdf files so you need to have a pdf converter to use it effectively in school
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: literacy web2.0

item.title: bookr :: pimpampum
item.description: Make embedable e-books for your blog using Flickr photos. Very simple to use, but you must have access to Flickr to use it
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: images literacy web2.0

item.title: Zattoo | TV meets PC
item.description: Digital TV on your PC without the need for a TV card or aerial. Fantastic service - simply download the client and register. Want TV on your whiteboard: look no further. Only thing you need to worry about is the minimum system requirements for your PC
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: tv video

item.title: Funky Ways to Express Yourself - BeFunky
item.description: Turn a photo into a cartoon: Neat!
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: animation art images resources

item.title: Learning Clip - Free resources Renewed Framework Y3 maths
item.description: A set of free resources for the Y3 maths framework
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: maths

item.title: Dipity - easy and embedable timelines
item.description: Easy to use timeline creator that's extremely simple to embed in your Wordpress blog.
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: blogging history

item.title: lingro: The coolest dictionary known to hombre!
item.description: Not a linguist, but this online dictionary looks very cool indeed.
item.dc:creator: creativeict
item.dc:subject: MFL web2.0
